website_summaries.verdict: A solid mortar and pestle crafted in natural granite, this model looks great and is made to last. Season it, rinse, and enjoy.
pros: Garners enthusiasm for a rugged build that provides excellent leverage for mashing and grinding numerous ingredients
Made of granite that is easy to clean
Pieces can be placed in the dishwasher
Backed by an impressive lifetime warranty
cons: Requires seasoning to smooth out rough areas, but works well once this task is performed

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it! Consider other products. This is my opinion and read my review
customer_reviews.text: I sucks. Just don't buy it. I bought it because it had good reviews. The surrounding border of mortar is not smooth, you can feel the roughness. The pestle sucks too. After a few times job, you can feel the pestle starts breaking pieces of sand and it WILL go straight to your food. Your stomach can not digest these kinds of materials, so it will try to increase the gastric acid in your stomach to digest it. Your stomach will feel floating after a meal maybe just for me but be careful when cooking. That's all I want to say, it depends on your trust to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ai Tran

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy, be careful!
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of heavy but very sturdy and pretty. I used crushed red pepper flakes to see how fine I could get it, the consistency is almost like flour! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I made a half-batch of pesto from scratch in my marble mortar, and I was struggling to keep it all inside the vessel. Well, *this* vessel with the pestle is big enough to hold pesto, or guacamole started from scratch with roasted peppers, or a good garlic-based marinade, or or or. It's also beautiful: the outside is studded with sparkles, and its roughness keeps it from slipping in your hands. Do Google the seasoning instructions. You need to pound rice into powder -- which takes some time and effort, at least if you're a noodle-armed person like me -- to get all the manufacturing dust out of the inside surface.
customer_reviews.author: Madame Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Great example of a simple tool.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you wash it before you use it, run the pestle around in the mortar for a minute or two, and then wash it again, lest you get a chunk of granite in your food! Once you've done that, this is a stellar pestle. For years I've always hated cracking the 1/4 cup of peppercorns required for Steak au poivre. This sucker chews through that. Also good for grinding cinnamon and cracking spices and making curry pastes that the food processor just can't manage. This isn't something you're gonna use every day, but there is simply no replacement for a mortar and pestle.
customer_reviews.author: Colin S. MartinTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the real deal! I was able to pulverize raw white rice into a powder (part of seasoning directions). As you can tell from the picture is is SOLID and sturdy. Comes with a felt bottom to protect your surfaces. Love this. Only slight slight very minor issue was the finish on the OUTSIDE of the mortar was shedding a few pieces of granite here and there (maybe like 2 pieces I found), but it in no way got into food on the side, it was just in my sink. A very small piece. I imagine this will stop once I “break it in” and wash a few more times
customer_reviews.author: Diane Marie

customer_reviews.title: absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL. I bought this as a gift and opened it up to take a look before I wrapped it... this piece is so beautiful. The pictures on here do not do it justice. I am not a rock person so I'm probably saying this wrong, but it has granite or something in it that makes it sparkle. The person I'm giving this to is a geologist so it makes it even better (I didn't pick it out because of the stone!) I'm so excited for them to receive this. The item is VERY heavy. I recommend storing it on a lower shelf when it's not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Thekat0

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5+ stars
customer_reviews.text: I used this to crush cumin seeds for an Indian recipe. Compared to my other pestle and mortar this completed the task more completely and with much less effort. The mortar is robust and regularly shapes and the pestlt is solid and properly sized for the bowl resulting in quick grinds to whatever degree you desire. My only suggestion relates to the hand end of pestle. It would be more comfortable if it was larger as the energy required to crush tends to cause some hand discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerbreadman

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 3 months!!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this pestle for 3.5 months and we were cleaning it and all of a sudden the pestle broke!!! It’s ridiculous. We were so excited to get it and are now so disappointed. We thought it would be sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the quality of this item. Nice, heavy weight that it won't slide around on the counter. It's beautiful. I've already heard from the manufacturer asking if it arrived in good condition and if not, they will do everything they can to make it right. They also said they would check back later to see how we like using it. I'm very impressed by the contact and the item. I would highly recommend this item to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shipley

customer_reviews.title: Utile et Dulce = Useful and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The Latin poet, Horace, said it long ago. This mortar and pestle is both beautiful to behold, almost like a sculpture hewn from granite, and it will also satisfy all your pulverizing culinary needs. As I said to my wife when I first set it our on our kitchen counter, "Can you believe it? I'm in love. With a mortar and pestle, no less!" Will last forever on kitchen duty, and will also make a great gift. One warning: It's really heavy. Solid granite, after all.
customer_reviews.author: Daveyjslocker

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one based on the positive reviews. This is the first mortar & pestle I've ever owned, and often wished I had one over the years. I have used it a few times now, and it seems to work very well. I have used it to grind up various seeds and spices, and made "calcium powder" out of egg shells with very little effort. It's very stable, and doesn't move around while you're grinding in it. Also very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mills

customer_reviews.title: A tool that has been with us for thousands of years
customer_reviews.text: It works! I needed a mortar & pestle for smooshing black cardomom seeds for my turkish coffee. The delightful aroma makes all that banging noise tolerable to those that would complain. The ancient tool, made of granite is just too cool for them to argue about. Do not worry about granite particles in your diet. I think it's the best thing I've ingested in a while, compared to how everything else has been vilified so. yeah yeah we're all gonna die and the sky is falling - get over your doom & gloom - get out and LIVE some! MAKE something cool! Make your own authentic fresh spices! Smoosh something! Take out all them pent-up angers and anxieties! MAKE SMOOSH!
customer_reviews.author: Industrial Power & Microelectronics L.L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen addition
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this product. I had taken it to a party given by a relative who immediately fell in love with it and had asked if they could keep it for a while. Needless to say, my relative asked if I would mind selling it to her. I gave her the Mortar and Pestle decided to buy another. It is great for mixing spices and crushing harder spices such as peppercorn. It is easy to clean and beautiful in the kitchen or on the table. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the average cook
customer_reviews.text: I once bought a small 3 inch mortar and pestle which I quickly grew to dislike due to the shortness for the pestle. This is a million times better. I can grab the pestle with my hand to really pound and mash my food into submission. But the pestle isn't so large that i can't rest my palm on the top of it and drive it in circles around the mortar. Highly recommend. (my hands are medium sized, don't know how this would feel for very large hands but I'm certain it would work great even down to VERY small hands)
customer_reviews.author: Amy A. Tomic

customer_reviews.title: No Brainer--If you're looking for a mortar and pestle, you found it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels like it's carved from a single piece of granite (maybe it is, I'm no expert :). Used it already to grind up some cumin. Worked perfectly. And it looks so good that we have it displayed on a shelf in the kitchen. Thanks for such a high quality product at such a low price!
customer_reviews.author: Big E

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe and Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Dangerous. Granite dust in food even after seasoning. As one reviewer said, it should have been glazed on the inside. Not to mention they sent us an obviously used product with stains in it.
customer_reviews.author: PRINCE MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: Great quality !
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions and was relentless grinding the rice, until i got a fine powder then i knew i was done, did the cleaning instructions, and did some garlic, salt, herbs to start. Ground down to a fine paste, so much better than the cheaper wooden mortar , the weight of the pestle combined with the very fine texture ofr the interior wall creates a grind that < I think , is much better than a food processor. Very impressed with this product, and it is beautiful to look at.
customer_reviews.author: ronald peters

customer_reviews.title: Not only useful, but substantial
customer_reviews.text: Many of the things in the kitchen are quickening, or easy to clean, etc. This is something you are able to take your time with [crushing things for recipes, etc] and you can feel good about using such a stately and substantial mortar and pestle. It takes a bit to prepare it, but my wife says it is worth it. And if you've seen any of my other reviews, her opinion is very important to me. You won't regret spending a little more for this one.
customer_reviews.author: roguefriar

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Second time using this product the pestle chipped and shards ended up in my food. I cracked my tooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Granite Mortar and Pestle by HiCoup - Unpolished-Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful weight and easy instructions on seasoning make it easier to get it ready for use. It works great for both grinding herbs and spices and making sauces for two. A beautiful edition to my kitchen counter it is gorgeous) and everyday cooking needs. Thank you HiCoup for also sending the seasoning instructions via email. I knew what to do when it arrived. Great company..outstanding well made item with an unmatched warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT !!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it on a lighting deal during Cyber Monday. I was starting to regret it as I thought "how am I going to use it" "will I use it?" and yes ! I have used it. I made guacamole and it was so fresh and just amazing. It is so pretty and it's now right next to my spices. I will be purchasing whole spices now vs ground. If you like to cook and taste fresh ingredients, yes, do buy it! You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shoppers

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Good size compared to most available around here for anywhere approaching a similar price. Solid. I use a silcone trivet under mine to protect the table and counter. I also find using this very therapeutic as a form of active meditation. When I decide to invest in one for crafting, I'll be back for another one of these. This one is staying in the kitchen for now. Buyer, make sure you season it!!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: A great mortar and pestle. Larger than what I am used to but I really love the extra size. I followed the instructions to season and it is now easy to grind and easy to clean. Would buy it again and will recommend and gift to friends and family!😎💕
customer_reviews.author: Donald Osterwise

customer_reviews.title: Grinds itself
customer_reviews.text: When I use this, stone dust comes off the bowl into my food.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ukkola

customer_reviews.title: Great Mortar/Pestle
customer_reviews.text: Quite a process to clean and season. I have made mayonnaise and guacamole with this. It is the right size for what I need and it performs well, i.e. course enough interior to either crush or mix ingredients,
customer_reviews.author: DennyJD

customer_reviews.title: Great mortar and pestle set
customer_reviews.text: Great mortar and pestle set. About 2 cups capacity for this size. Seasoned using the included instructions. Works great and doesn't carry over any smells after a simple rinse and scrub in hot water. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Casey in Omaha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome addition to the kitchen for perfect sauces, chutneys.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome addition to the kitchen, treated first with wet rice and pulverized it couple of times, washed well to take out the grainy stuff that came with the mortar. Then started making our favorite gongura chutney, came out perfect, which would end up gooey otherwise with electric mixers. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Good Earth

customer_reviews.title: Works great now I want a bigger one
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, nice and hefty, would advise to go with a bigger size, I scuff my knuckles once in a while using this one. I did grind gaelic in this and the smell lingered into next use but did not affect flavor or aroma of the sugar I was grinding. I've use this most frequently to grind ganular sugar into powder in a pinch when baking, after seasoning is by grinding 1/3 cup of rice to powder, nothing is impossible with this! Leverage is key when achieving results.
customer_reviews.author: E.I.

customer_reviews.title: Good product and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Pestle arrived broken. However, after contacting customer service a new product was immediately sent and received in 2 days, intact. We immediately seasoned the mortar as per the directions and began using it. It is great. A nice, quality product that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy
customer_reviews.text: I am not all that thrilled with it and considered returning it. It was a bear to season. It is very heavy and not the easiest thing to clean. The pestle seems short to me. However, it does seem well made and should last a long time. And, it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dale BLodgett

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Product
customer_reviews.text: Its a sturdy, heavy product which is great. But I feel like it needs to be broken in a lot more to be effective. I cannot see this product crushing spices consistently due to its porous nature. It works fine with guacamole, but the cleaning is not ideal. Maybe after significant use it is easier to clean and more effective, but after a month's use it is more of a novelty at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Johnston

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: The product states that it’s non porous, which is why I purchased it but the product is very porous and I’ve scrubbed it with a wire brush as directed and I’m still getting lots of residue/black grit rubbing off the product and Is rather not have that ingredient in my food. I don’t recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Morris

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, well made Mortar & Pestle
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter who works for a compounding pharmacy - she loves it! It is a good size and easy to handle. It is very heavy and well made. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

customer_reviews.title: A heavy, heavy-duty kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and looks cool in the kitchen. This mortar/pestle is very heavy and that is the only thing that makes it difficult to manage. But the description was accurate and I knew that upfront. It does the job. You do have to 'season' it before use or everything you mash turns a bit grey. After that, it works as promised.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Great for heavy duty use.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and i argued over this purchase as she didn't think she would use it much. She now keeps it right by the sink as a display piece (its beautiful even after heavy use) and regularly uses it to get the right consistency with spices.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This a great deal for such a large sized mortar and pestle. The mortar comfortably fits about a cup and a half, and both objects have hefty weight to them for easy grinding. I've ground both dry spice mixes and wet pastes, and this makes quick work of both. The company was also great about sending a replacement when the first time around, the pestle came cracked in half. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: SGC

customer_reviews.title: Brittle Pestle That Will Break
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this product. The pestle chipped a week after I bought this and is now useless. Not quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Spain

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy to say the least and a nice décor design ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy to say the least and a nice décor design on the mortar. It does a great job of crushing the herbs from my garden; quite better than what I could accomplish by hand. I never realized there was a seasoning process prior to use of a mortar and pestle which was a little laborious with grinding the rice but, trudged through it w/ no complaint per se. I'm really going to enjoy this mortar - pestle; very pleased with the craftsmanship and shipment was very expedient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mortar and pestle for crushing herbs and spices. It is very heavy and has a non-skid base so it isn't going anywhere while using it. A simple rinse with water is all it takes to clean and it does not appear to take on any odor or color. The pestle could be a little larger compared to the mortar to prevent what you're crushing from pushing up the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Granite Mortar & Pestle. This thing is solid & heavy. Easy to clean. Grinds great! I just made some Guacamole today using it.
customer_reviews.author: NRM

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, works great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mortar and pestle set. It looks very nice and does an excellent job. It is made of granite and has a somewhat rough, unfinished look on the exterior. It is heavy. The bottom is made of a material like felt. The inside of the receptacle is somewhat rough, but not as rough as the exterior. It works well for grinding and powderizing. The pestle is polished on the sides, as is the top of the receptacle. It is quite useful for preparing herbs in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: ionysos

customer_reviews.title: My kitchen is now alive.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love 💕 it. Just arrived and my kitchen smells amazing. Tomorrow it’s pesto day. I wish I had found this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set
customer_reviews.text: I am an herbalist so need to grind up plant matter often. The weight of the pestle is perfect and the grinding surfaces work efficiently together. So far the clean up has been easy although it took a bit of scrubbing after grinding whole cloves because of the higher oil content. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Mortar & Pestle
customer_reviews.text: Wahed it hot water and soap, scrubbed it with a green scrubby, rinsed and scrubbed with more hot water until water was clean. Then put in 1/4 cup rice and pulverized the inside until rice was powdered. Rinsed out and dried overnight Then put in some black peppercorns, whole cumin and coriander seeds and pulverized until powdery. Now it's ready to be used for my Thai curry paste.
customer_reviews.author: Rick N.

customer_reviews.title: Will outlast everyone
customer_reviews.text: Great in the kitchen for spices. Cruching spices and herbs up really makes a difference from just cutting. Its large, heavy, and will last longer than we do.
customer_reviews.author: BayAreaJay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this a Christmas gift for my step mom. She’s used it already and loves it. It’s pretty heavy and Sturdy. I can see her using this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: MGomez

customer_reviews.title: Durable, High Quality and Porous - The perfect mortar and pestle basically.
customer_reviews.text: I love how heavy it is, it provides great support when grinding together spices, pastes or dips. Unlike a smooth marble mortar and pestle, this used granite and kept the finish porous, allowing you to grind more efficiently without the ingredients sliding unnecessarily. Bonus feature is the thin padding at the bottom of the product, which prevents any damage to countertops.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. Solid, heavy, and just the right weight to grind anything. It's also big enough to make a full batch of pesto.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quality mortar and pestle
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, sturdy mortar and pestle. I followed the instructions to season it and I am looking forward to making homemade guacamole and mojitos using this.
customer_reviews.author: jenna1973

customer_reviews.title: Items like rosemary and dried red bell peppers do not crush
customer_reviews.text: Does not work for spices. Items like rosemary and dried red bell peppers do not crush. (UPDATE: I was sent an ugly e-mail from this company after leaving this review!)
customer_reviews.author: Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Great Mortar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for all the basil I have in my garden and was very impressed by it. I dont care for the all the debris that comes off the sides of it, as it makes a mess. Overall I am pleased
customer_reviews.author: Terry Littlejohn

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product - A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: WOW! It's larger and heavier than I expected so this was an added bonus. The product is well made and not only is it functional but it looks great on my counter! I'm going to have to buy a few more for presents! I've priced them as well and this price is lower than most of those inferior to this product. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria B.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe too heavy?
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but it’s very heavy and the surface is slightly too porous so whatever you crush gets lodged in the surface
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love this addition to our kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: The mortar and pestle are beautiful and will be used often. Arrived on time and carefully packaged. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BMo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing is heavy. But that means I didn't have to push as hard grinding my spices dnd herbs. Love it! Really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mikyj

customer_reviews.title: Nice, real granite
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy the one's claiming to be granite but are really cement. This is the real think.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This seems like it will hold up for a while
customer_reviews.text: This seems like it will hold up for a while. I knocked off a star because of how dusty it is. The instructions say to break up rice in it to clean it out but no matter how many times I do this, my white rice turns to a dirty grey powder from debris. I'm sure I will get it clean eventually. Otherwise it is solid and works like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Good for my use
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and weight. I followed the directions to prepare it for use by grinding up some rice to a powder. So far I've used it to pulverize egg shells for my chickens and to grind up food for baby chicks. What came looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: L. Young

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and most recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. As expected. Takes me back to the ancient ways, enjoyable to use and beautiful bowl, smashes even dried alma with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Anikka singleton

customer_reviews.title: Leaves granite dust
customer_reviews.text: It requires a GREAT deal of curing (like hours and hours). I've worked on it for a VERY long time. Leaves granite particles in the food AND all over my counter top. I don't know about you but I'm not particularly interested in seasoning my food with rock dust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real Grinding Tool
customer_reviews.text: This mortar and pestle is top quality. Arrived well packaged and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and useful
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this mortar and pastel. I have used for dry ingredients (peppercorns, spices etc.) and wet ingredients (avacado, tomatoes, etc.) It works well with both! It is exactly how it looks in the pictures as well regarding color
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in perfect condition. Product is heavy and large - I love it. Never had such good guacamole.
customer_reviews.author: ItsMeKat

customer_reviews.title: It is heavy  so don’t drop it on your feet.
customer_reviews.text: This mortar and pestle was purchased for my son, the home cook. He liked the weight of it and the strength of the pestle. He said he didn’t think the mortar will move around much because it is heavy making it easier to use. I liked it because the colors blend well in our kitchen so it can be left out on the counter for easy access. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorra2

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: Iv'e been using this mortar for about a year now. It is very durable, a good weight, and has a nice capacity. Very easy to clean, just use clear water and allow to air dry.
customer_reviews.author: pb

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who is a really good cook and he loves it. Said it is well made and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Kuntz

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time and works fine I had expected the outside to be a little less rough edged and the inside to slick type smooth surface instead it’s powder smith type surface not sure if this means it slowly powered the material into what your grinding or not and it’s little larger and heavier then I expected
customer_reviews.author: Todd H.

customer_reviews.title: It's the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: Most mortar and pestle's I've handled seemed small-ish and well, meh. This though looks excellent, very heavy, and as well flt lined on the bottom so it doesn't scratch my counters! Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: TommyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Most awesome mortar and pestle ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough..I would not be able to live fully without this beautiful mortar and pestle. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: crazydiamond

customer_reviews.title: Very nice present, overdue
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy cooking, so receiving this as a Christmas present was LONG overdue for me. Having the ability to grind and blend my own spices is extremely useful. As I've just received this it is hard to rate on cleanability or durability.
customer_reviews.author: John Hollenbach

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set !
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels like a quality product just got it seasoned and have only used once. But looking forward to many years of creating tasty dishes !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use this for spices
customer_reviews.text: I use this for first time, love it! it's really heavy and I know it's good quality and thank you HiCoup for reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Viking2014

customer_reviews.title: Best mortar and pestle I tried so far
customer_reviews.text: I tried so many different mortar and pestle, but this is the best one ever. Does the job perfectly! I m using it to crush garlic, Indian spices - pepper,cumin seeds, red chili, etc. and it crushes so well. It’s so heavy, so we just have to be more careful while using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mahe

customer_reviews.title: Superb mortar and pestle
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in perfect condition. We have seasoned it as per instructions but haven't used it yet. Looks like it will work just fine for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: jeannel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Solid; seems very well made after inspection. Haven't seasoned it yet but am very pleased with it. This would make and excellent gift.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Potential to Love
customer_reviews.text: I have now ordered this mortar and pestle twice. Both times it came with the pestle broken in half. Very very unfortunate because it's beautiful. I now have returned both and am waiting for the refund and I will order it again. If it comes brokwn a third time it has to be the packaging isn't protective enough.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaigne Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It's big
customer_reviews.text: A big, heavy and sturdy product. It did involve a lot of work to "season".
customer_reviews.author: Andy Rich

customer_reviews.title: I loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it!!! I make a lot of things like sausage, herbal medicine, etc. and had a need to grind ,y own herbs and seeds. My only complaint is that there was no documentation with the product and had to go online to find out how to 'season' my mortar and pestle.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby L. Donald

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, follow the seasoning instructions and you wont have any problems, mine does not left any artificial flavors or residues, I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Rivera

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product with Clear Instructions
customer_reviews.text: This granite M&P is h-e-a-v-y. Really high-quality stone and sturdy so it stays in place when using it. It comes with a little pamphlet of directions with how to season/prep it. (Grinding rice into powder, and then seasoning with spices). Once you survive that process, it is easy to use and maintain. I've made pesto and other recipes so far and it works great! Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my wife...
customer_reviews.text: She loves the size and being able to use it. Of course, getting it set up at the start tired out her arms, but with the use she gets out of it, I know she feels it was well worth it. Also, it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making a nice batch of pesto. Worked well from the garlic, pine it’s & basil. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product
customer_reviews.text: It's good and heavy, well made, and works great. We keep it on the counter for easy access...it's that nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Appearance is not as viewed
customer_reviews.text: This mortar is too heavy and looks and feels like a cheap block of cement. I was not happy with the overall appearance of it but will keep it for its use.
customer_reviews.author: Cdecap

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Didn’t realize you had to season this mortar and pestle but that’s my inexperience. Roll up your sleeves and do it exactly as instructed. It takes awhile to grind the rice but it’s only one time. Have used this product many times and it works really well. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Queenbee

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks great. Great size too. I like that it’s wider. Makes it easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: CAsoccermom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and sturdy design
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a few months now. It's working perfectly well. Crushes everything but a diamond.
customer_reviews.author: Tdp

customer_reviews.title: Love the larger size
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 as gifts for Christmas, and included several different spices. Love the larger size, also looks very stylish on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: DeeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really need all that much cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Having read all the notes about getting rid of the inner ridges, pounding rice, etc., I found that it was quite smooth already, and needed only washing to clean it up. Then proceeded to make garam masala. It's great. Needs a bit more pounding than I expected, but all-in-all, it really works well and looks great. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: 1Fotowizz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful product. Definitely an awesome as a gift as well! I love it and I can’t wait to start making my own pestos
customer_reviews.author: Karry

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product. Heavy and large capcity
customer_reviews.text: It's very heavy and the stone remains unpolished, which creates a lightly rough surface that facilitates grinding. Capacity is good. The felt pad on the bottom (to protect countertops) feels a bit thin and I worry it will wear over time. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: MKPoker

customer_reviews.title: Great company and product
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought this from this company. They sent me an email before I received my mortar and pestle on how to properly condition it with white rice and garlic cloves. I can't wait to get to start using to break down my herbs and for other food.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Tritt

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality! Looks nice on the countertop too!
customer_reviews.text: The mortar and pestle are very good quality. It took awhile to design it, but that's to be expected. My chef husband enjoys grinding his own spices, so it's very useful, and I don't mind having it on my countertop. It is quite heavy, so make sure not to leave it anywhere it could fall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a cheap crappy qaulity mortar and pestle for a long time now. This was a HUGE upgrade. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Lauralye Waring

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy well made product. It looks great in our kitchen
customer_reviews.author: sandi m

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mortar and pestle!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much. Took a lot of time and energy to season it but it works amazing and I love it. Never want to buy ground spices again. I’m grinding my own!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Simones

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to begin using. Instruction for preparing (seasoning) it were easy to follow. It looks rustic and awesome on my kitchen counter
customer_reviews.author: chpowell

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Made food in this works as it says what else do you need to know.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: GAVE IT TO OUR DAUGHTER FOR CHRISTMAS. SHE HAS ...
customer_reviews.text: GAVE IT TO OUR DAUGHTER FOR CHRISTMAS. SHE HAS BECOME A CHEF IN TRAINING. SHE LOVES IT. SHE USES IT ALL THE TIME AND WE GET TO EAT EVERYTHING SHE IS COOKING FOR US.
customer_reviews.author: Gunther

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than picture
customer_reviews.text: It looks fantastic, much better than the picture! It was hard to gauge the size. It is bigger than expected. It's very heavy, super sturdy, works great. Not the cheapest, but I am very pleased with it and I would recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Lynn Pacitti

product_meta.title: Granite Mortar and Pestle by HiCoup - Natural Unpolished, Non Porous, Dishwasher Safe Mortar and Pestle Set, 6 Inch Large
feature_bullets: REQUIRED MODERN COOKING EQUIPMENT - A kitchen's ambience is defined by the aroma of herbs and spices battling against each other before they are added to a recipe. These strong flavors are unleashed when using the HiCoup Kitchenware mortar and pestle. Our giant size black and grey granite stone mortar and pestle crusher is handy for everything from cracking peppercorns and crushing tender herbs to making pesto, salsa and guacamole.

CHEF PREFERRED – Chefs prefer traditional granite mortars and pestles over clay, ceramic, glass, marble, wooden or other stones one since granite mortar and pestle sets never fails to product the best and most delicious paste. You will discover that the fine flavors produced from food ground in the HiCoup granite mortar and pestle are far superior to the flavors of foods ground in a mortar and pestle made from other materials.

EXCELS AT THE FULL RANGE OF TASKS – From mashing delicate herbs to grinding stubborn peppercorns, our solid, hand-carved mortar and pestle out-rivals the competition. The huge, heavy duty, and broad-based pestle needs to do little more than fall on ingredients to crush them – very little elbow grease required. And the bowl’s big, extra deep sloped shape and rough matte texture keep ingredients in the centre, so there’s no need to chase them around with the pestle.

HEALTHY AND EASY TO CLEAN – Our gray granite mortar and pestle is literally rock hard, is non-porous, will not absorb flavors and odours, and its matte surface creates friction for grinding but is smooth enough to wipe clean easily. Additionally, studies have shown that granite dust, which gets into the ingredients pounded in a granite mortar and pestle, contains 5% potassium and has associated with it 16 minerals. Potassium aids the functions of the cells and different organs in our bodies.
A HIGH-QUALITY PRODUCT BACKED BY OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE – We’ll let our reviews and seller feedback speak for themselves.
